hero.name: Tran Huu Sach
hero.typedItems: Embedded Developer for IoT, Hardware Circuit Design, Web Development, App Development

sectionText: Hello! I am Tran Huu Sach, a passionate Embedded Developer specializing in IoT systems and Hardware Circuit Design.
I am enthusiastic about creating smart automation solutions. With a background in Control and Automation Engineering,
I specialize in designing and developing efficient IoT systems, writing embedded code for various hardware platforms,
and building interactive web and mobile applications. My experience includes working with platforms such as Arduino,
ESP32, STM32, and integrating sensors and controllers into smart systems. I also have expertise in electronic circuit design,
playing a crucial role in many projects I have worked on.

content.title: Embedded Developer for IoT
intro: In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technologies, solving complex problems, and keeping up with the latest trends
content.conclusion: Feel free to reach out if you are interested in collaboration or have any questions!

skills.title: Skills
intro: With expertise in embedded programming, IoT systems, and hardware circuit design, I focus on developing innovative
solutions that seamlessly integrate hardware and software. My goal is to create smart, efficient, and reliable automation
systems that are applicable to real-world use cases.

sectionTitle.title: Resume
sectionTitle.intro: This section provides a brief introduction about myself and my key achievements in career and education.

portfolio.portfolio-content: I have worked on various notable projects such as the Smart Garden, HMI Monitoring System, and Wind Power Model, delivering smart and efficient automation solutions. Each product is carefully crafted, from hardware to software, to best meet practical needs.
